string-array.name: promote_calendar_flight_title
string-array.item: "Don't miss another flight."
"Don't miss another flight."
Add this flight to your calendar?
Get reservations on your Google Calendar.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_flight_text
string-array.item: Google Calendar automagically adds flights and other reservations to your calendar.
Google Calendar automatically adds flights and other reservations to your calendar.
Events from Gmail can be automatically added with the Google Calendar app.
Get flight, hotel and restaurant reservations added automatically.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_hotel_title
string-array.item: Add this reservation to Google Calendar?
Want reservations automatically on your Calendar?

string-array.name: promote_calendar_hotel_text
string-array.item: With the Google Calendar app, events from Gmail are automatically added to your calendar.
Google Calendar automatically adds hotels and other reservations from your emails.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_restaurant_title
string-array.item: Get a timely notification for your meal.
Add this reservation to Google Calendar?
Get reservations automatically on your Google Calendar.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_restaurant_text
string-array.item: Google Calendar automatically adds restaurant and other reservations to your calendar.
Events from Gmail can be automatically added to your calendar.
Get flight, hotel and restaurant reservations added automatically.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_event_title
string-array.item: Get a timely notification before this event.
Add this event to Google Calendar?
"Don't miss your event."

string-array.name: promote_calendar_event_text
string-array.item: Google Calendar automatically adds events and reservations, like the one in this email, to your calendar.
Events from Gmail can be automatically added to your calendar.
Get events and other reservations added automatically with Google Calendar.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_mixed_title
string-array.item: Track your reservations in one place.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_mixed_text
string-array.item: Get flight, hotel and restaurant reservations added automatically to your Google Calendar.
Events from Gmail can be automatically added to your calendar.
